tika.dc.description:
Welcome to the exciting world of Biomedical Science Professionals! If you are interested in a career in biomedical science, you've come to the right book. So what exactly do these people do on the job, day in and day out? What kind of skills and educational background do you need to succeed in this field? How much can you expect to make, and what are the pros and cons of these various professions? Is this even the right career path for you? How do you avoid burnout and deal with stress? This book can help you answer these questions and more.

This book covers seven of the many, many careers in this growing and well-respected field. You'll also find interviews with professionals talking about their day-to-day and their take on the future of their fields.

  • Biomedical Engineer
  • Clinical Biochemist
  • Clinical Laboratory Technologists
  • Epidemiologist
  • Forensic Scientist
  • Medical scientist
  • Microbiologist
tika.dc.rights: © 2021 by The Rowman & Littlefield Publishing Group, Inc.
